stable.body:
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• More UI improvements
• Some bug fixes
stable.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- Shizuku support [#29](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/29) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/6341d1eeccef931f96b52611c08ec21aa2f71d88))
- **settings**: move to top bar, add categories [#45](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/45) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ec72d2e7646a19d432e39abb184ab592429656ce))
- **l10n**: update Turkish translations [#43](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/43) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/a8669d0ec62e30e1f7b02c2b2a619b43b8c46748))

## Bug Fixes
- **maps**: show progress dialog when sharing [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/2b37481d9fd7ba0b771da18b449e77e6d62ee1a9))

## Documentation
- **README**: improve building instructions [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/8c35edd9bfc96c283e05cc9283bd60d10d7d67ed))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/581faf44cfe2532274e243858b97d58397eadf38))
- update app version to v1.7.0 (17000) [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/1e88078daf65037a00b298763509a4fb9ea12504))
- merge branch `dev` into `main` [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/51a64e541b55a019fdf0791dda550293e0cdfbdd))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/releases/tag/v1.7.0)

preRelease.body:
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• More UI improvements
• Some bug fixes
preRelease.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- Shizuku support [#29](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/29) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/6341d1eeccef931f96b52611c08ec21aa2f71d88))
- **settings**: move to top bar, add categories [#45](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/45) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ec72d2e7646a19d432e39abb184ab592429656ce))
- **l10n**: update Turkish translations [#43](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/43) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/a8669d0ec62e30e1f7b02c2b2a619b43b8c46748))

## Bug Fixes
- **maps**: show progress dialog when sharing [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/2b37481d9fd7ba0b771da18b449e77e6d62ee1a9))

## Documentation
- **README**: improve building instructions [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/8c35edd9bfc96c283e05cc9283bd60d10d7d67ed))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/581faf44cfe2532274e243858b97d58397eadf38))
- update app version to v1.7.0 (17000) [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/1e88078daf65037a00b298763509a4fb9ea12504))
- merge branch `dev` into `main` [#44](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/44) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/51a64e541b55a019fdf0791dda550293e0cdfbdd))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/releases/tag/v1.7.0)
